caption.p: Changes in the social cost of carbon resulting from new damage functions in the agricultural sector. a Agricultural impacts only, decomposed by geographic region (see Supplementary TableÂ 4 for region definitions). b The total social cost of carbon (SCC), keeping damages in all non-agricultural sectors fixed.
